name: SetPlayerHealth
notes:
If a player's health is set to 0 or a minus value, they will die instantly.
 If a player's health is below 10 or above 98303, their health bar will flash.
warnings: Health is obtained rounded to integers: set 50.15, but get 50.0
description: Set the health of a player.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the health of.

params_body.name: Float:health
params_body.description: The value to set the player's health to. Max health that can be displayed in the HUD is 100, though higher values are valid.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player specified does not exist.
related_fn:
GetPlayerHealth: Find out how much health a player has.
 GetPlayerArmour: Find out how much armour a player has.
 SetPlayerArmour: Set the armour of a player.
